overall_health.summary: System partially functional with 3 critical issues requiring immediate attention

agora.error: Endpoint not found - Agora may not be configured

p0_critical.title: Admin Users Stats API Returns 500 Error
p0_critical.description: GET /admin/users/stats returns 500 Internal Server Error after multiple retries
p0_critical.impact: Blocks admin dashboard user statistics display

suggested_fix.approach: Debug aggregation pipeline in getUsersStats controller

p0_critical.rollback_plan: Revert controller changes, fallback to basic user count

p0_critical.title: Database Monitoring Endpoints Not Registered
p0_critical.impact: Cannot monitor production database health from admin panel

suggested_fix.approach: Register database routes in app.js: app.use('/api/admin/database', databaseRoutes)

p0_critical.rollback_plan: Comment out route registration line in app.js

p0_critical.title: 31 Expected Database Collections Missing
p0_critical.description: 31 collections expected by models but not found in database
p0_critical.impact: Features may fail when trying to access non-existent collections

suggested_fix.approach: Run database migration script to create missing collections with default indexes

p0_critical.rollback_plan: Drop newly created collections if issues occur

p1_high.title: Admin Stats Endpoint Returns 404
p1_high.impact: Some UI components may fail if using /admin/stats instead of /admin/dashboard

suggested_fix.approach: Add route alias: router.get('/stats', getDashboard) in admin routes

p1_high.title: Stream Providers Admin Endpoint Missing
p1_high.impact: Cannot manage Agora/ZegoCloud configuration from admin panel

suggested_fix.approach: Create stream providers admin route and controller

p1_high.title: 6 Collections Need Performance Indexes
p1_high.description: Collections missing createdAt/updatedAt indexes for sorting
p1_high.impact: Slow query performance on date-sorted lists
reproduction_steps: Query large datasets sorted by date

suggested_fix.approach: Run db.collection.createIndex({ createdAt: -1, updatedAt: -1 }) for each collection

p1_high.title: 10 Admin Management Endpoints Missing
p1_high.description: Admin routes for content, products, stores, orders return 404
p1_high.impact: Admin cannot manage resources from centralized /admin/* routes

suggested_fix.approach: Register admin sub-routes OR update frontend to use correct paths

p2_medium.title: Streaming Provider Credentials Not Configured
p2_medium.description: Agora and ZegoCloud endpoints return 404 or credentials missing
p2_medium.impact: Live streaming features may be unavailable

p2_medium.title: Auth Refresh Token Endpoint Returns 401
p2_medium.description: /auth/refresh returns 401 (may need refresh token in body)
p2_medium.impact: Token refresh may not work, users forced to re-login

suggested_fix.approach: Update auth controller to accept refresh token in body OR document required format

p2_medium.title: Very Low Production Data Volume
p2_medium.impact: May indicate new environment or minimal usage; tests may be incomplete

suggested_fix.approach: Run seed script to populate test data OR verify this is expected for new production

p2_medium.rollback_plan: Clean up test data: db.collection.deleteMany({ __test: true })

immediate_actions.reason: Prevents feature failures when accessing non-existent collections

next_steps: 1. Review P0 critical issues and assign to developers
2. Apply P0 fixes using patches in workspace/P0_FIXES/
3. Test fixes in staging environment before production deployment
4. Deploy fixes to production with rollback plan ready
5. Monitor logs after deployment for any regressions
6. Schedule P1/P2 fixes for next sprint
7. Re-run audit after fixes to validate improvements
